title: Is natural law a source for man's law? - Quora

response.answer_text: YES. Natural Law is the Source for Constitutional Law, a Government of Laws, NOT men, in order to secure each person’s Creator-endowed rights to Life, Liberty & Property. It is the purest Source for principles and obligations, a philosophy asserting that certain laws are inherent by virtue of Human Nature, endowed by Nature - traditionally by God or a transcendant Source - and that these can be understood universally by Human Reason. Unfortunately, the virtues of Human Nature and Human Reason are far too often, corrupted.

The term natural law implies that laws are imposed upon us by nature, which is misleading. It is more correct to say that man’s nature, a being who requires freedom to act on his own judgement because nature does not provide him with any automatic means, logically leads to a system of man-made law to protect that freedom.
